title: At last, a Weeds about weed (also Obamacare)
description:
Sarah, Ezra, and Matt talk about Democrats' plans to improve Obamacare and new evidence that smoking pot makes you bad at math.

Links!

White paper: ‘High’ Achievers? Cannabis Access and Academic Performance

Ezra's conversation with Dr. Nneka Jones Tapia

Latest Worldly episode

Tell us (and other Weeds fans) what you thought about the episode in our Facebook group!

Subscribe to VoxCare for healthcare news in your inbox daily!
